医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新蛋白质显示出治疗收缩性心力衰竭的潜力心脏是一块与众不同的肌肉，昼夜不停地平均每分钟跳动 60 至 100 次。但当它变得虚弱时，可能会导致严重的问题：从令人衰弱的呼吸短促、腿脚肿胀到肺部积液，甚至死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New- Protein-shows-pottial-for-treating-systolic-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New- Protein-shows-pottial-for-treating-systolic-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05deb56c-8254-483f-8761-83cefc5f023a Wed, 16 Oct 2024 21:12:00 -0400 New protein shows potential for treating systolic heart failure
突破性的抗菌绷带可在事故中快速止血如果没有适当的医疗发明，交通碰撞、严重工作场所事故或武器造成的伤害可能会导致致命的失血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Groundwriting-antimicrobial-bandage-offers-rapid-hemostasis-in-accidents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Groundwriting-antimicrobial-bandage-offers-rapid-hemostasis-in-accidents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b23e346-45e0-4db8-a033-39e640f66fd1 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 21:00:48 -0400 Groundbreaking antimicrobial bandage offers rapid hemostasis in accidents
FDA 批准的乳腺癌药物显示出治疗阑尾癌的希望加州大学圣地亚哥分校医学院的研究人员发现，FDA 批准的一种用于治疗乳腺癌的药物有可能成为治疗特定类型阑尾癌的有效疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-approved-breast-cancer-drug-shows-promise-for-appendix-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/FDA-approved-breast-cancer-drug-shows-promise-for-appendix-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2e0cf0d-977b-4a0f-8c68-3b19ca41e5b8 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:55:17 -0400 FDA-approved breast cancer drug shows promise for appendix cancer
创新的纳米颗粒疗法为对抗前列腺癌带来了希望前列腺癌是美国男性癌症死亡的第二大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Innovative-nanoarticle-therapy-offers-hope-in​​-fighting-prostate-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Innovative-nanoarticle-therapy-offers-hope-in​​-fighting-prostate-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bee9986a-1abb-467e-8447-66d3cbe22038 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:50:21 -0400 Innovative nanoparticle therapy offers hope in fighting prostate cancer
免疫疗法为霍奇金淋巴瘤治疗设定新标准一种集结免疫系统来消灭癌症​​的治疗方法将晚期霍奇金淋巴瘤患者的生存率提高到了惊人的 92%，这为该疾病提供了一种新的标准疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Immunotherapy-sets-new-standard-for-Hodgkin-lymphoma-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Immunotherapy-sets-new-standard-for-Hodgkin-lymphoma-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=533378bd-bed8-4cd5-8cc0-e6ea0e56258c Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:47:23 -0400 Immunotherapy sets new standard for Hodgkin lymphoma care
研究表明艾滋病毒感染者肾移植的安全性一项新的研究表明，对于需要肾移植的艾滋病毒感染者来说，从艾滋病毒呈阳性的捐赠者那里获取器官与从未感染该病毒的捐赠者那里获取器官一样安全有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Study-shows-safety-of-kidney-transplants-among-those-with-HIV-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Study-shows-safety-of-kidney-transplants-among-those-with-HIV-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e8fefc3c-c6f4-4da6-a1c9-8e8492274b1a Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:42:48 -0400 Study shows safety of kidney transplants among those with HIV infections
新型手持设备有望实现快速血液诊断去看医生提供血液样本的患者通常需要使用针头和注射器，并等待数小时或数天才能从实验室获得结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New-handheld-device-promises-rapid-blood-diagnostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/New-handheld-device-promises-rapid-blood-diagnostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb5b4822-4d52-4be0-ae7b-708bafe04c39 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:34:37 -0400 New handheld device promises rapid blood diagnostics
溶栓药物替奈普酶对中风恢复显示出良好的效果根据 2024 年 10 月 16 日发表的一项荟萃​​分析，对于缺血性中风患者，使用血栓溶解药物替奈普酶治疗比阿替普酶治疗三个月后获得良好恢复的可能性略高，并可减少残疾。美国神经病学学会的医学杂志 Neurology® 在线期刊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Clot-busting-drug-tenecteplase-shows-promising-results-for-中风-recovery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Clot-busting-drug-tenecteplase-shows-promising-results-for-中风-recovery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f97197ae-c2cc-4629-888f-cbdbc6ba5903 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 20:30:02 -0400 Clot-busting drug tenecteplase shows promising results for stroke recovery
研究强调纽约市空气污染和气候政策对健康的益处一项新研究分析了 1998 年至 2021 年期间纽约市主要空气污染和气候政策的制定与空气质量显着改善之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Study-highlights-health-benefits-of-air-pollution-and-climate-policies-in-New-York-City.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Study-highlights-health-benefits-of-air-pollution-and-climate-policies-in-New-York-City.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d892555-729c-439d-b7cd-c24c72c8b4f5 Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:47:51 -0400 Study highlights health benefits of air pollution and climate policies in New York City
腺嘌呤碱基编辑器显示出纠正 X-CGD 引起的突变的潜力美国国立卫生研究院国家过敏和传染病研究所 (NIAID) 和麻省总医院 (MGH)（麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统的创始成员）的研究人员合作，展示了精确基因组编辑技术的潜力，该技术称为腺嘌呤碱基编辑器，以纠正 X 连锁慢性肉芽肿病 (X-CGD) 患者干细胞中的致病突变，X-CGD 是一种罕见的遗传性疾病，其特征是对感染高度敏感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Adenine-base-editors-show-pottial-to- Correct-X-CGD-causing-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241016/Adenine-base-editors-show-pottial-to- Correct-X-CGD-causing-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cc2b6451-9e5c-49df-8146-2f760b35a74f Wed, 16 Oct 2024 14:33:00 -0400 Adenine base editors show potential to correct X-CGD-causing mutations
